Element.name: Unused Tag Slot (-1 indicates no more tag skills/may be updated if player uses Tag! Perk)

Subrecord.name: REPL
Subrecord.desc: List of items that can be used to repair this item.

Subrecord.name: BIPL
Subrecord.desc: parts beloning to this item from ARMA

Subrecord.name: DNAM
Subrecord.desc: Damage Resistance(DR) -- actual DR is this value*0.01

Subrecord.name: DESC
Subrecord.desc: Book Description - Sometimes a copy of the book name.

Subrecord.name: TNAM
Subrecord.desc: Sound Record - Melee - Swing / Gun - No Ammo

Subrecord.name: ZNAM

Subrecord.name: ONAM
Subrecord.desc: Short Name - Displayed when viewing weapons.

Subrecord.name: DATA
Subrecord.desc: Effect Type ([X,3,3] for below affects combat stats depending on X: 0=normal damage 2=critical damage 6==damage to player limbs 8==VATS accuracy 36==critical chance AGAINST player
